name: glamsbeatz-ecommerce
description: Premium e-commerce platform for shoes and bags

scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp *.html *.md public/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r src public/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r images public/ 2>/dev/null; cp -r glamsbeatz-ecommerce/* public/ 2>/dev/null; echo 'Build complete'

author: Glamsbeatz
